CutSceneText.Text: I don't have to tell you, the destructive power of the Dredgion is enormous....
So much so that it's well-nigh impossible to get close enough to one to damage it.
And once it drops its load of Drakan ground troops,
nothing can stop the Balaur from taking the fortress you've just secured.
The good news is, we've discovered a way to sabotage it from within.
If we can get someone inside, we can
disable the Dredgion and smash the Balaur!
